title: 'Pervasive racism' left tens of thousands of Black and Asian war dead uncommemorated, UK inquiry finds
content:
1. 'Pervasive racism' left tens of thousands of Black and Asian war dead uncommemorated, UK inquiry finds  CNN
  2. Government apologises over failure to commemorate black and Asian troops  BBC News
  3. UK apologizes for racism in memorials to WWI dead  The Associated Press
  4. Our shameful failure to commemorate black Great War heroes  Spectator.co.uk
  5. Britain’s unequal troop commemorations due to ‘pervasive racism’  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
'Pervasive racism' left tens of thousands of Black and Asian war dead uncommemorated, UK inquiry finds  CNN

localize.title: 人種差別が蔓延し、何万人もの黒人・アジア人戦没者が記憶されていないことが判明。
英国调查发现，"普遍存在的种族主义 "使数以万计的黑人和亚裔战死者没有得到纪念
英國調查發現，"普遍存在的種族主義 "使數以萬計的黑人和亞裔戰死者沒有得到紀念
